rules.description: Changes lead status to pitched when 1-1 attended equals true

Records when CAP services are pitched

rules.fullName: CB trial - Sync to Marketo - lead

rules.description: Synchronizes all leads with new SSO
rules.formula:
AND(
NOT(ISNULL(Email)),
OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(City), ISCHANGED(Company), ISCHANGED(Country), ISCHANGED(Email), ISCHANGED(FirstName), ISCHANGED(IsConverted), ISCHANGED(LastName), ISCHANGED(OwnerId), ISCHANGED(Phone), ISCHANGED(PostalCode), ISCHANGED(State), ISCHANGED(Street) )
)

criteriaItems.value: Bad Number,Dupe,Do Not Call,Not Interested in CAP

rules.description: When a Bark/Paid Media Lead owner is updated from a queue to a user (Or from General Queue to user) the Date For Reassignment is updated to one business day later
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(OwnerId), OR( BEGINS(PRIORVALUE(OwnerId) , '00G'), PRIORVALUE(Owner_Name__c) = 'General Lead'), BEGINS(OwnerId , '005'), OR( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Bark'), INCLUDES(Campaign__c, 'MVF Global'), INCLUDES(Lead_Type_New__c, 'Marketing') ) )

rules.description: Checks the SMS Opt Out box when a ZenBusiness lead is created.
